CustomField.description: Calculated cleared amount based on status. Cleared = Total_Payment__c + Wires_received__c. NSF = Wires_received__c only. Other statuses = 0.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cleared"), (IF(ISBLANK(Total_Payment__c), 0, Total_Payment__c) + IF(ISBLANK(Wires_received__c), 0, Wires_received__c)), IF( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "NSF"), IF(ISBLANK(Wires_received__c), 0, Wires_received__c), 0 ) )
CustomField.label: Cleared Amount
